data.message: A shitty artist representing the best rap group of all time bone thugs all day that's the best part of this pic is that T-shirt and Eminem

replies.message: Marquis Harrell how can you say Em has a white fan base, he was close with all black rappers in his time, that just sounds like your trying to justify why his sales are so great... it's because his music reaches out to so many people... he's in the game to do just that, to touch the people who need someone to understand them just like he needed someone when he was growing up in the game when all those LEGENDS understood him.
